summary: This is an email chain from December 1, 2018, discussing the Miami Herald's investigative reporting on the Jeffrey Epstein sex trafficking case. The correspondents indicate they are 'open' to investigating the case further and note it is 'on the d/l for now,' suggesting a new or ongoing inquiry.

events.title: Miami Herald Epstein Article Published
events.description: The Miami Herald publishes an investigative article about the Jeffrey Epstein sex trafficking case and accusations.

keyFacts: An email chain dated December 1, 2018, references the Miami Herald's reporting on the Jeffrey Epstein sex trafficking case.
The correspondents discuss being 'open' to investigating the case, asking 'Are we open on this? Can we be?'
One message states the matter is 'on the d/l for now,' suggesting a discreet or confidential inquiry is underway.
The communication indicates journalistic or investigative interest in the Epstein case following the Miami Herald's publication.
